sentence: Both Democrats running for governor, former Cincinnati Mayor John Cranley and former Dayton Mayor Nan Whaley, have agreed to debate.
author: Jessie Balmert
title: Ohio governor's race: Mike DeWine won't debate Republicans hoping to unseat him

sentence: The debate for the Democratic candidates for governor, John Cranley and Nan Whaley, is scheduled for the same day and location at 7 p.m, moderated by WVXU “Cincinnati Edition” host Lucy May.
author: Annie WU | WKSU
title: Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine declines to participate in gubernatorial debate

sentence: The winner of the Republican primary will face the Democratic nominee, either former Cincinnati Mayor John Cranley or ex-Dayton Mayor Nan Whaley.
author: John Seewer
title: As Ohio tilts right, governor’s moderate image becomes liability
